item.title: Nothing is off the table as Trump and Putin set to meet
item.description: "Trump wants to exhaust all options to have a peaceful end to war," the White House said Thursday. Whether those "options" are good or bad for Ukraine...

item.title: DC sues Trump to reverse federal takeover of police force
item.description: Trump on Monday federalized the Washington, D.C., police department and ordered the deployment of National Guard troops in the capital city.

item.title: Trump puts Washington, DC, police under federal control, deploys National Guard
item.description: Trump in a social media post on Sunday declared that "the Homeless" in Washington, D.C., will "have to move out."

item.title: Russian media is buzzing over Trump–Putin talks. The mood in Kyiv is very different
item.description: Russian media is reveling in the global attention and platform garnered by the Trump-Putin summit, while the mood in Kyiv is far from upbeat.

item.title: Five things at stake in Trump and Putin’s high-level talks
item.description: Trump-Putin talks in Alaska on Friday could be the catalyst for far-reaching changes for Ukraine, Europe and the world.
